posts.topic_title: I feel this problem is just perfect for April Fools' day

posts.java: public class Solution {--newline--    public int findLUSlength(String a, String b) {--newline--        return a.equals(b) ? -1 : Math.max(a.length(), b.length());--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--}

posts.python: class Solution :--newline----tab--    def findLUSlength(self, A, B):--newline----tab--        if A == B:--newline----tab--            return -1--newline----tab--        return max(len(A), len(B))--newline----tab--

posts.java: public class Solution {--newline--    public int findLUSlength(String a, String b) {--newline--        return a.equals(b) ? -1 : Math.max(a.length(), b.length());--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
